extension.summary: Graphical frontend for the Pulseaudio Equalizer.
Graphische Oberfläche für den Pulseaudio Klangfilter.
extension.description:
Provides functionality for audio adjustments, digital room correction and profile management. Requires pulseaudio-equalizer to be installed on the system.
https://github.com/wastis/PulseEqualizerGui

Enthält Funktionalität zur Klangeinstellung, der digitalen Raumkorrektur sowie ein Profilmanagement. Benötigt den pulseaudio-equalizer auf dem System.
https://github.com/wastis/PulseEqualizerGui
extension.news:
v2.1.6 (2022-08-28) - own filter setting for removable devices plugged in - autoswitch to and from plugged and unplugged usb devices - always switch back to default device on unplug to avoid conflict between Kodi and equalizer - stability optimizations
v2.1.5 (2022-08-25) - fix context menu default selection - fix device select menu double entries - add device config menu to set default device (BT switch back device) - improve output switching on bluetooth device connect and disconnect
v2.1.4 (2022-04-14) - userinterface improvements - color support for many skins - introduced settings
v2.1.3 (2022-04-01) - mini key map editor to easy create keymap file for equalizer, including most important kodi commands - add kodi user profile support and moved settings save location - changes to improve menu pop up speed on slow devices
v2.1.2 (2022-03-22) - Improved error message, in case pulse-equalizer is not installed - Source code clean-ups - Change of file structure to match standad - Add System Volume into main menu - Dynamic sliders for slow remotes in Volume and Equalizer GUI - Possibilty to configure slider step-size in keymap
v2.1.1 (2021-12-16) - fix some problems with Kodi 19.3 on raspberry (audio device conflicts, bt-device on/off issues)
v2.1.0 (2021-12-06) - added Room Correction functionality - more flexibility in filter frequency selection - some user interface changes
